query: What is the average temperature near indian region in march
answer:
A) Human-friendly answer:
The average temperature near the Indian region in March, based on available Argo float data, is approximately 11.4°C [SQL:24797 rows]. This value is an overall mean and includes measurements from various depths, not just the surface. For a clearer understanding, a histogram or line chart showing temperature distribution by depth or location is recommended.

B) Structured JSON:
===STRUCTURED_JSON_START===
{
  "type": "table",
  "title": "Average Temperature near Indian Region in March (All Depths)",
  "headers": ["Variable", "Mean (°C)", "Median (°C)", "Min (°C)", "Max (°C)", "Std Dev"],
  "rows": [
    ["TEMP", 11.41, 9.62, -1.24, 31.17, 8.33],
    ["TEMP_ADJUSTED", 11.73, 10.12, -1.23, 30.84, 8.06]
  ]
}
===STRUCTURED_JSON_END===
